name: Mechanorimon
description: Mekanorimon is mechanical Digimon with a humanoid body structure. Its body is encased in metal, except for the elbows of its long, segmented arms which have exposed wiring. Its face has five holes that show its eyes and it also has five metal structures resembling teeth. It possesses three bone-shaped fingers on the tips of each arm and three claw-like talons on the ends of each foot. It features a red lens on its chest that can emit lasers, and it has a prominent blue dome on its head. It has what appears to be an engine on its back, with two exhaust pipes on the left side.
